member.name: T:WebService.ConfigSettings
member.summary: Runs to establish configuration for this service. Does this vis-a-vis ApplicationPackageRoot/ApplicationManifest.xml

member.name: P:WebService.ConfigSettings.RoomManagerName
member.summary: This reference is used by the stateful service controller in order to correctly route requests to the service.

member.name: P:WebService.ConfigSettings.PlayerManagerName
member.summary: This reference is used by the stateful game controller in order to correctly route requests to the service.

member.name: P:WebService.ConfigSettings.ReverseProxyPort
member.summary: Called to dynamically get the correct port that related services will have open.

member.name: M:WebService.Controllers.PlayerController.#ctor(System.Fabric.StatelessServiceContext,System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Fabric.FabricClient,WebService.ConfigSettings)
member.summary: Receives the context of the webservice the controller is operating in, the context of the Fabric client it is talking to, and then its configuration and parameters for sending http messages.

member.name: T:WebService.Controllers.RoomController
member.summary: This controller is responsible for routing requests sent from clients to the correct stateful service replica, and then deserialize and package the response data.

member.name: M:WebService.Controllers.RoomController.#ctor(System.Fabric.StatelessServiceContext,System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Fabric.FabricClient,WebService.ConfigSettings)
member.summary: Receives the context of the webservice the controller is operating in, the context of the Fabric client it is talking to, and then its configuration and parameters for sending http messages.

member.name: M:WebService.Program.Main
member.summary: This is the entry point of the service host process.

member.name: T:WebService.WebService
member.summary: The FabricRuntime creates an instance of this class for each service type instance.

member.name: M:WebService.WebService.CreateServiceInstanceListeners
member.summary: Optional override to create listeners (like tcp, http) for this service instance.
